svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
January 13, 2024" date: "2024-01-12"
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming
using Goerli client releases Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
Goerli shadow fork 2 : stable network with blob spamming using Goerli client releases
• Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb
Fork choice filter change: to be included in Deneb
• Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS
Consensus layer priorities: discuss next call, proposed Electra EIPs & PeerDAS
• Ephemery testnet upgrades to Dencun January 18
Ephemery testnet upgrades to Dencun January 18
• Goerli testnet upgrades to Dencun January 17 Bug bounty doubled for Dencun specific vulnerabilities, up to $500k
Goerli testnet upgrades to Dencun January 17
• Bug bounty doubled for Dencun specific vulnerabilities, up to $500k
Client releases for Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade
• Consensus layer: Lighthouse v4.6.0-rc.0 : pre-release Lodestar v1.14.0-rc.2 : pre-release Nimbus v24.1.1 Prysm v4.2.0 Teku v24.1.0
• Execution layer: Besu v24.1.0 Erigon v2.56.2 Geth v1.13.10 Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support Reth v0.1.0-alpha.14
• Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support
Nethermind v1.25.0 : OP Stack Canyon upgrade support
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold Social action options to tackle a concentrated actor
🚨 Lido at 31.84% is far too close to 33.3% threshold
• Social action options to tackle a concentrated actor
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split Consensus
layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth 84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
• Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm 41%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal , particularly outside of North America & Europe
• Increasing gas limit debate: Péter Szilágyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change Marius van der Wijden: risks include
missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs Vitalik: modest increase is reasonable
• Péter Szilágyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
Péter Szilágyi: need monitoring & metrics before making a change
• Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity
Marius van der Wijden: risks include missed block rate, state size, history size, sync times & client diversity
• Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
Ansgar Dietrichs: EIP4844 is equivalent of ~11M additional gas
• Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
Dankrad Feist: wait until after Dencun , then also increase calldata cost & number of blobs
• Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
Besu halted on mainnet January 6, ~70% of Besu nodes impacted, hot fixed
• Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
Nethermind State Database experimental approaches: Paprika, Path-Based Storage & Halfpath
• Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
Explainers: EIP7002 (execution layer triggerable exits) & EIP7251 (increase max effective balance)
• EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability across rollups, Lido, security
budget, capping signatures to 8192 per slot, gas limit increase, native (enshrined) rollups, EigenLayer, MEV burn & EIP7251 (increase max
EF Research team AMA , discussions include: EIP4844 data publishing without scaling, composability across rollups, Lido, security budget,
capping signatures to 8192 per slot, gas limit increase, native (enshrined) rollups, EigenLayer, MEV burn & EIP7251 (increase max
• Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
Staking economics: issuance impact on staking equilibrium & reward curve options
• Proposals for relay incentivization : low-latency relay mesh network and enshrining missed slot penalty on proposers
• OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0), reduces rate of basefee change & adds
OP Stack Canyon upgrade live on Superchain mainnets, adds Shappella support (including PUSH0), reduces rate of basefee change & adds
• RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP precompile addresses) discussion and
RIP working groups (precompiles, EIP4844 testing & fee markets)
RollCall (L2 standards) video & notes : RIP7212 (R1 precompile) made final, EIP7587 (reserve RIP precompile addresses) discussion and RIP
working groups (precompiles, EIP4844 testing & fee markets)
• EIPs EIP7591 : BLS signed transactions EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification EIP7594 : PeerDAS (peer data availability
• EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
EIP7592 : Precompile for Falcon signature verification
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7589 : Semi-fungible token roles ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs ERC7593 : NFT synthetic evidence
• ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs
ERC7590 : ERC20 holder extension for NFTs
• Remix v0.40.0 : Ape framework Vyper compiler, Uniswap v4 templates & Circom v2.1.6
Remix v0.40.0 : Ape framework Vyper compiler, Uniswap v4 templates & Circom v2.1.6
• GasliteNFT (ERC721 base contract): extends ERC721A with Ownable2Step & MerkeProofLib
GasliteNFT (ERC721 base contract): extends ERC721A with Ownable2Step & MerkeProofLib
• Evm-inspectors : Revm Inspectors for Parity & Geth style traces and JS Inspector
Evm-inspectors : Revm Inspectors for Parity & Geth style traces and JS Inspector
• Wevm Vocs : React-based static documentation generator, content in Markdown or MDX
Wevm Vocs : React-based static documentation generator, content in Markdown or MDX
• Wise Lending ~177 ETH exploit via precision issue
Wise Lending ~177 ETH exploit via precision issue
• Behind the scenes of Euler March 2023 exploit & fund recovery
Behind the scenes of Euler March 2023 exploit & fund recovery
• Optimism’s RetroPGF round 3 results , 30M OP allocated to 501 builders & creators
• Unicef Rwanda using staking to fund school internet connectivity
Unicef Rwanda using staking to fund school internet connectivity
• X (Twitter) removed NFT profile picture support
X (Twitter) removed NFT profile picture support
• Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.2 to 483.5 gwei, with 26.2 gwei average Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei 3.2k ETH net burn
Gas fees (via ultrasound.money ): 9.2 to 483.5 gwei, with 26.2 gwei average
• Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
Zero net issuance currently at 21.9 gwei
• USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
USDC & EURC v2.2 upgrade complete: reduces gas costs & supports ERC1271
• OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy
OpenSea email onboarding : create non-custodial wallet via email address using Privy
• Simon de la Rouviere See You There : 1 of 1 NFT, records holders over 5 years
Simon de la Rouviere See You There : 1 of 1 NFT, records holders over 5 years
• Speedtracer (daily mini game) live on Base, trace a race track & mint highest score
Speedtracer (daily mini game) live on Base, trace a race track & mint highest score
• Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
Status is hiring: Technical Chief Operating Officer - Apply here
• ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
ZK circuits engineer sought by EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
• SEC approves BTC ETFs Commissioner Peirce : “squandered a decade of opportunities” SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone
• Commissioner Peirce : “squandered a decade of opportunities”
Commissioner Peirce : “squandered a decade of opportunities”
• SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone number without 2FA
SEC Twitter account was compromised via a phone number without 2FA
• New York DFS settles with Genesis for compliance failures, $8M penalty & cease operations in the state
New York DFS settles with Genesis for compliance failures, $8M penalty & cease operations in the state
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and @evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in
• Jan 15 – EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
Jan 15 – EF’s Next Billion fellowship cohort 4 deadline
• Jan 17 – Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 231680, livestream
Jan 17 – Goerli testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 231680, livestream
• Jan 30 – Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
Jan 30 – Sepolia testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 132608 (assuming no issues)
• Feb 2-4 – ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
Feb 2-4 – ETH Cinco de Mayo hackathon (Cholula, Puebla)
• Feb 7 – Holešky testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 29696 (assuming no issues)
Feb 7 – Holešky testnet Dencun upgrade epoch 29696 (assuming no issues)
• Mar 19-21 – ETH Canal (Panama City, Panamá) conference & hackathon
Mar 19-21 – ETH Canal (Panama City, Panamá) conference & hackathon
• Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
Apr 5-26 – ETHGlobal Scaling Ethereum virtual hackathon
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
